content: Professionals like Tami, Alfonso, and Kimberly bridge the wide gap between patients and the healthcare system through their unwavering empathy, active listening, and commitment to addressing patient concerns. Their tireless dedication to professionalism and patient satisfaction reinforces DCC’s commitment to delivering exceptional care and always leading with care.
